title: Shawl, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton ground
Technique: satin, buttonhole, and chain stitches on plain weave ground
creditline: Gift of C. Albert Jacob, Jr.
description: Rectangle of fine muslin densely embroidered with field of stylized heads in brilliant vermillion and blue green silk floss.  Deep end borders with row of stylized boteh. Traces visible of original inked outlines for embroidery.  Made of three panels (not breadths) seamed up long sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, late 19th–early 20th century.
late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton ground
Technique: satin, buttonhole, and chain stitches on plain weave ground. Gift of C. Albert Jacob, Jr.. 1957-109-1.
